TEXT.English: Reset Options To Defaults
TEXT.French: Reset Options To Defaults
TEXT.German: Auf Standardoptionen zurücksetzen
TEXT.Italian: Reset Options To Defaults
TEXT.Spanish: Resetear Opciones a Predefinidas
TEXT.Finnish: Reset Options To Defaults

TEXT.English: Reset all options back to mod defaults (game effect is immediate but reload BUG options screen to visually confirm)
TEXT.French: Reset all options back to mod defaults (game effect is immediate but reload BUG options screen to visually confirm)
TEXT.German: Alle Optionen auf Standard dieses Mods zurückstellen (Änderungen sind im Spiel unmittelbar wirksam, BUG-Optionen neu starten, um sie hier zu sehen
TEXT.Italian: Reset all options back to mod defaults (game effect is immediate but reload BUG options screen to visually confirm)
TEXT.Spanish: Resetea todas las opciones a las predefinidas del mod (los cambios de los efectos en el juego son inmediatos, pero recarga la pantalla de Opciones Bug para confirmarlo)
TEXT.Finnish: Reset all options back to mod defaults (game effect is immediate but reload BUG options screen to visually confirm)

TEXT.English: Display detailed AI attitude info
TEXT.French: Display detailed AI attitude info
TEXT.German: Zeigt detailierte Infos zur Einstellung der KIs
TEXT.Italian: Display detailed AI attitude info
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra información detallada de la actitud de la IA
TEXT.Finnish: Display detailed AI attitude info

TEXT.English: When checked, enables the Hidden Attitude Mod by DaveMcW
TEXT.French: When checked, enables the Hidden Attitude Mod by DaveMcW
TEXT.German: Schaltet den verborgenen Einstellungsmodus (Hidden Attitude Mod) von DaveMcW ein
TEXT.Italian: When checked, enables the Hidden Attitude Mod by DaveMcW
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, habilita el Mod Actitud Oculta de DaveMcW
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, enables the Hidden Attitude Mod by DaveMcW

TEXT.English: DynamicCivNames Mod
TEXT.French: Mod de DynamicCivNames
TEXT.German: DynamicCivNames MOD
TEXT.Italian: MOD "DynamicCivNames"
TEXT.Spanish: Nombres dinámicos de la civilización
TEXT.Finnish: DynamicCivNames Mod

TEXT.English: Enable the DynamicCivNames mod component: renames civs based on their civics and other properties. Only works in English.
TEXT.French: Permettez le composant de mod de DynamicCivNames : retitre des civs basés sur leur éducation civique et d'autres propriétés. Travaille seulement en anglais.
TEXT.German: Aktivieren Sie den DynamicCivNames-MOD-Baustein: benennt Civs basierend auf ihre Staatsformen und sonstige Eigenschaften um. Funktioniert nur auf englisch einwandfrei.
TEXT.Italian: Attiva il componente "Definizioni Dinamiche" (DynamicCivNames): rinomina le civiltà in base a forma di governo ed altre proprietà (in inglese).
TEXT.Spanish: Activado componente de Revolution Mod: Renombra las civilizaciones basandose en sus principios y otras propiedades (Mod)
TEXT.Finnish: Enable the DynamicCivNames mod component: renames civs based on their civics and other properties. Only works in English.

TEXT.English: Ranged Bombardment
TEXT.French: Ranged Bombardment
TEXT.German: Fernbombardierung
TEXT.Italian: Ranged Bombardment
TEXT.Spanish: Bombardeo a Distancia
TEXT.Finnish: Ranged Bombardment

TEXT.English: Enables a ranged attack for most seige units (excluding catapults)
TEXT.French: Enables a ranged attack for most seige units (excluding catapults)
TEXT.German: Ermöglicht die Fernbombardierung für die meisten Belagerungswaffen (ausgenommen Katapulte)
TEXT.Italian: Enables a ranged attack for most seige units (excluding catapults)
TEXT.Spanish: Habilita el ataque a distancia para la mayoría de las unidades de asedio (excluidas las catapultas)
TEXT.Finnish: Enables a ranged attack for most seige units (excluding catapults)

TEXT.English: Opportunity Fire
TEXT.French: Opportunity Fire
TEXT.German: Gelegenheitstreffer
TEXT.Italian: Opportunity Fire
TEXT.Spanish: Ataque de Oportunidad
TEXT.Finnish: Opportunity Fire

TEXT.English: Enables sentry siege the possibilty to inflict damage through opportunity volleying
TEXT.French: Enables sentry siege the possibilty to inflict damage through opportunity volleying
TEXT.German: Ermöglicht Belagerungswaffen, Schaden durch Gelegenheitstreffer (engl. opportunity fire) zu erzeugen
TEXT.Italian: Enables sentry siege the possibilty to inflict damage through opportunity volleying
TEXT.Spanish: Habilita que las unidades de asedio en posición de vigía puedan infringir daño a través de fuego a distancia de oportunidad.
TEXT.Finnish: Enables sentry siege the possibilty to inflict damage through opportunity volleying

TEXT.English: Enhanced Air Bombardment
TEXT.French: Enhanced Air Bombardment
TEXT.German: Verbesserte Luftbombardierung
TEXT.Italian: Enhanced Air Bombardment
TEXT.Spanish: Bombardeo Aereo Avanzado
TEXT.Finnish: Enhanced Air Bombardment

TEXT.English: Enables bombers to bomb city buildings and other missions
TEXT.French: Enables bombers to bomb city buildings and other missions
TEXT.German: Ermöglicht Bombern Gebäude zu bombardieren und weitere Missionen
TEXT.Italian: Enables bombers to bomb city buildings and other missions
TEXT.Spanish: Habilita a los bombarderos atacar edificios de las ciudades y otras misiones
TEXT.Finnish: Enables bombers to bomb city buildings and other missions

TEXT.English: Active Fighter Defense
TEXT.French: Active Fighter Defense
TEXT.German: Aktive Jägerverteidigung
TEXT.Italian: Active Fighter Defense
TEXT.Spanish: Intercepcion Aerea Activa
TEXT.Finnish: Active Fighter Defense

TEXT.English: Allows patrolling fighters to actively engage enemy units
TEXT.French: Allows patrolling fighters to actively engage enemy units
TEXT.German: Erlaubt patrouillierenden Jägern aktiv feindliche Einheiten anzugreifen
TEXT.Italian: Allows patrolling fighters to actively engage enemy units
TEXT.Spanish: Permite que los cazas en misión de intercepción se enfrenten a las unidades enemigas activamente
TEXT.Finnish: Allows patrolling fighters to actively engage enemy units

TEXT.English: Fighter Engagement
TEXT.French: Fighter Engagement
TEXT.German: Jägerangriff
TEXT.Italian: Fighter Engagement
TEXT.Spanish: Lucha de Cazas
TEXT.Finnish: Fighter Engagement

TEXT.English: Enables fighters to actively target and engage enemy aircraft
TEXT.French: Enables fighters to actively target and engage enemy aircraft
TEXT.German: Ermöglicht Jägern aktiv auf feindliche Luftkräfte zu zielen und sie anzugreifen
TEXT.Italian: Enables fighters to actively target and engage enemy aircraft
TEXT.Spanish: Permite que los cazas puedan atacar a las unidades aéreas enemigas
TEXT.Finnish: Enables fighters to actively target and engage enemy aircraft

TEXT.English: Archer Bombard
TEXT.French: Archer Bombard
TEXT.German: Bogenschützenbombardierung
TEXT.Italian: Archer Bombard
TEXT.Spanish: Bombardeo de Arqueros
TEXT.Finnish: Archer Bombard

TEXT.English: Enables a ranged attack for Archery Units
TEXT.French: Enables a ranged attack for Archery Units
TEXT.German: Ermöglicht Fernangriffe für Bogenschützeneinheiten
TEXT.Italian: Enables a ranged attack for Archery Units
TEXT.Spanish: Permite el ataque a distancia para las unidades de Arqueros
TEXT.Finnish: Enables a ranged attack for Archery Units

TEXT.English: Battle Effects
TEXT.French: Battle Effects
TEXT.German: Kampfeffekte
TEXT.Italian: Battle Effects
TEXT.Spanish: Efectos de Batalla
TEXT.Finnish: Battle Effects

TEXT.English: Causes "Battlefield Terrain", which significantly reduces productivity and mobility on plots where a battle is fought
TEXT.French: Causes "Battlefield Terrain", which significantly reduces productivity and mobility on plots where a battle is fought
TEXT.German: Erzeugt auf der Karte das Feld "Schlachtfeld" (engl. "Battlefield Terrain"), auf den Flächen, auf denen ein Kampf ausgetragen wird, die Produktivität senkt und Bewegung von Einheiten verringert
TEXT.Italian: Causes "Battlefield Terrain", which significantly reduces productivity and mobility on plots where a battle is fought
TEXT.Spanish: Causa "Terreno de Batalla", lo que reduce significativamente la producción y la movilidad en las casillas donde se lucha una batalla.
TEXT.Finnish: Causes "Battlefield Terrain", which significantly reduces productivity and mobility on plots where a battle is fought

TEXT.English: Stack Attack
TEXT.French: Stack Attack
TEXT.German: Stapelangriff
TEXT.Italian: Stack Attack
TEXT.Spanish: Ataque en Masa
TEXT.Finnish: Stack Attack

TEXT.English: Enables unit stacks to attack in animated succession, automating the process of attacking by stack; This option has been known to cause stability issues and is not recommended
TEXT.French: Enables unit stacks to attack in animated succession, automating the process of attacking by stack; This option has been known to cause stability issues and is not recommended
TEXT.German: Ermöglicht Einheitenstapel in einer animierten, automatisierten Folge anzugreifen; Diese Option erzeugt bekanntermaßen Stabilitätsprobleme und wird nicht empfohlen
TEXT.Italian: Enables unit stacks to attack in animated succession, automating the process of attacking by stack; This option has been known to cause stability issues and is not recommended
TEXT.Spanish: Permite que las unidades apiladas ataquen en sucesivamente, automatizando el proceso de ataque para unidades apiladas. Esta opción puede causar problemas de estabilidad y no está recomendada.
TEXT.Finnish: Enables unit stacks to attack in animated succession, automating the process of attacking by stack; This option has been known to cause stability issues and is not recommended

TEXT.English: Attack Support
TEXT.French: Attack Support
TEXT.German: Angriffsunterstützung
TEXT.Italian: Attack Support
TEXT.Spanish: Apoyo al Ataque
TEXT.Finnish: Attack Support

TEXT.English: Enables both offensive and defensive bombard units to bombard assist the attacking/defending unit while retaining their turn; is dependent on whether archer and ranged bombardment are enabled
TEXT.French: Enables both offensive and defensive bombard units to bombard assist the attacking/defending unit while retaining their turn; is dependent on whether archer and ranged bombardment are enabled
TEXT.German: Ermöglicht es, offensiven und defensiven Bombardierungseinheiten andere angreifende oder verteidigende Einheiten durch Bombardement zu unterstützen und dabei keinen Bewegungspunkt zu verlieren; hängt davon ab, ob Bogenschützen- und Fernbombardierung aktiviert sind
TEXT.Italian: Enables both offensive and defensive bombard units to bombard assist the attacking/defending unit while retaining their turn; is dependent on whether archer and ranged bombardment are enabled
TEXT.Spanish: Habilita a las unidades capaces de bombardeo a distancia, el apoyo tanto al ataque como a la defensa de otras unidades mientras permanezcan en su turno; depende de si está habilitado el bombardeo a distancia de arqueros y unidades de asedio.
TEXT.Finnish: Enables both offensive and defensive bombard units to bombard assist the attacking/defending unit while retaining their turn; is dependent on whether archer and ranged bombardment are enabled

TEXT.English: IDW Enabled
TEXT.French: IDW Enabled
TEXT.German: EbK aktiviert
TEXT.Italian: IDW Enabled
TEXT.Spanish: IDW Activado
TEXT.Finnish: IDW Enabled

TEXT.English: Causes battle outcomes to effect cultural control of tiles; national borders tend to shift based on the results of a war
TEXT.French: Causes battle outcomes to effect cultural control of tiles; national borders tend to shift based on the results of a war
TEXT.German: Einfluss basierter Krieg (engl. Influence Driven Warfare): Kampfergebnisse beeinflussen den Kulturanteil eines Geländefeldes; Grenzen verschieben sich abhängig vom Ausgang des Krieges
TEXT.Italian: Causes battle outcomes to effect cultural control of tiles; national borders tend to shift based on the results of a war
TEXT.Spanish: Provoca que el resultado de las batalles afecte a la influencia cultural de las casillas; las fronteras culturales tienden a variar dependiendo de los resultados de la guerra.
TEXT.Finnish: Causes battle outcomes to effect cultural control of tiles; national borders tend to shift based on the results of a war

TEXT.English: Emergency Draft
TEXT.French: Emergency Draft
TEXT.German: Notfallrekrutierung
TEXT.Italian: Emergency Draft
TEXT.Spanish: Reclutamiento de Emergencia
TEXT.Finnish: CEmergency Draft

TEXT.English: Causes weakened units to spawn in defense of cities that are under attack with no defender if the defenseless city still has significant cultural influence of the owning civilization
TEXT.French: Causes weakened units to spawn in defense of cities that are under attack with no defender if the defenseless city still has significant cultural influence of the owning civilization
TEXT.German: Ermöglicht die Entstehung von geschwächten Einheiten in Städten, die ohne Verteidungseinheit angegriffen werden und dabei genügend kulturellen Einfluss der verteidigenden Zivilisation besitzen
TEXT.Italian: Causes weakened units to spawn in defense of cities that are under attack with no defender if the defenseless city still has significant cultural influence of the owning civilization
TEXT.Spanish: Provoca que unidades debilitadas aparezcan en defensa de ciudades que estén bajo ataque y no tengan defensores, si la ciudad aun posee una influencia cultural significativa de la cultura de la civilización propietaria.
TEXT.Finnish: Causes weakened units to spawn in defense of cities that are under attack with no defender if the defenseless city still has significant cultural influence of the owning civilization

TEXT.English: No Barbarian Influence
TEXT.French: No Barbarian Influence
TEXT.German: Keine Beeinflussung bei Kampf mit Barbaren
TEXT.Italian: No Barbarian Influence
TEXT.Spanish: Sin Influencia Bárbara
TEXT.Finnish: No Barbarian Influence

TEXT.English: Battles with barbarian units have no effect on the cultural control of terrain
TEXT.French: Battles with barbarian units have no effect on the cultural control of terrain
TEXT.German: Kämpfe mit Barbaren haben keinen Einfluss auf den Kulturwert des Geländefeldes
TEXT.Italian: Battles with barbarian units have no effect on the cultural control of terrain
TEXT.Spanish: Batallas con los barbaros no influirán en el control cultural del territorio.
TEXT.Finnish: Battles with barbarian units have no effect on the cultural control of terrain

TEXT.English: No Naval Influence
TEXT.French: No Naval Influence
TEXT.German: Keine Beeinflussung auf Meeresfeldern
TEXT.Italian: No Naval Influence
TEXT.Spanish: Sin Influencia Naval
TEXT.Finnish: No Naval Influence

TEXT.English: Battles between naval units have no effect on tile cultural control
TEXT.French: Battles between naval units have no effect on tile cultural control
TEXT.German: Kämpfe zwischen Seeeinheiten haben keinen Einfluss auf den Kulturwert des Geländefeldes
TEXT.Italian: Battles between naval units have no effect on tile cultural control
TEXT.Spanish: Batallas entre unidades navales no influirán en el control cultural del territorio.
TEXT.Finnish: Battles between naval units have no effect on tile cultural control

TEXT.English: Pillage Influence
TEXT.French: Pillage Influence
TEXT.German: Beeinflussung durch Plünderung
TEXT.Italian: Pillage Influence
TEXT.Spanish: Influencia del Saqueo
TEXT.Finnish: Pillage Influence

TEXT.English: Pillaging improvements has an effect on tile cultural control
TEXT.French: Pillaging improvements has an effect on tile cultural control
TEXT.German: Die Plünderung von Geländefeldverbesserungen beeinflusst den Kulturwert
TEXT.Italian: Pillaging improvements has an effect on tile cultural control
TEXT.Spanish: Los saqueos influirán en el control cultural del territorio.
TEXT.Finnish: Pillaging improvements has an effect on tile cultural control

TEXT.English: Spy Promotions
TEXT.French: Spy Promotions
TEXT.German: Beförderung von Spionen
TEXT.Italian: Spy Promotions
TEXT.Spanish: Ascenso de los Espías
TEXT.Finnish: Spy Promotions

TEXT.English: Enables spies to gain experience and obtain promotions
TEXT.French: Enables spies to gain experience and obtain promotions
TEXT.German: Ermöglicht Spionen Erfahrungspunkte zu sammeln und befördert zu werden
TEXT.Italian: Enables spies to gain experience and obtain promotions
TEXT.Spanish: Permite a los espías obtener experiencia y conseguir ascensos.
TEXT.Finnish: Enables spies to gain experience and obtain promotions

TEXT.English: Bribe Mission
TEXT.French: Bribe Mission
TEXT.German: Bestechungsmission
TEXT.Italian: Bribe Mission
TEXT.Spanish: Misiones de Soborno
TEXT.Finnish: Bribe Mission

TEXT.English: Spies can bribe workers to join the spy's civilization and abandon it's current owner
TEXT.French: Spies can bribe workers to join the spy's civilization and abandon it's current owner
TEXT.German: Spione können Bautrupps bestechen, sich ihrer Nation anzuschließen
TEXT.Italian: Spies can bribe workers to join the spy's civilization and abandon it's current owner
TEXT.Spanish: Los espías pueden sobornar a trabajadores para unirse a la civilización del propietario del espía y abandonar a su nación actual.
TEXT.Finnish: Spies can bribe workers to join the spy's civilization and abandon it's current owner

TEXT.English: Assassinate Mission
TEXT.French: Assassinate Mission
TEXT.German: Attentatsmission
TEXT.Italian: Assassinate Mission
TEXT.Spanish: Misiones de Asesinato
TEXT.Finnish: Assassinate Mission

TEXT.English: Spies can assassinate settled great people
TEXT.French: Spies can assassinate settled great people
TEXT.German: Spione können Attentate auf große Persönlichkeiten durchführen, die sich einer Stadt angeschlossen haben
TEXT.Italian: Spies can assassinate settled great people
TEXT.Spanish: Los Espías pueden asesinar a los grandes personajes.
TEXT.Finnish: Spies can assassinate settled great people

TEXT.English: Holy City Relocation
TEXT.French: Holy City Relocation
TEXT.German: Heilige Stadt versetzen
TEXT.Italian: Holy City Relocation
TEXT.Spanish: Reubicación Ciudad Santa
TEXT.Finnish: Holy City Relocation

TEXT.English: Allows inquisitions to purge Holy Cities; if there exists a civilization that has two cities with the religion of the purged holy city, the holy city will relocate
TEXT.French: Allows inquisitions to purge Holy Cities; if there exists a civilization that has two cities with the religion of the purged holy city, the holy city will relocate
TEXT.German: Erlaubt es Inquisitionen Heilige Städte auszulöschen; wenn eine Zivilisation mit 2 Städten dieser Religion existiert, so wird die Heilige Stadt dorthin versetzt
TEXT.Italian: Allows inquisitions to purge Holy Cities; if there exists a civilization that has two cities with the religion of the purged holy city, the holy city will relocate
TEXT.Spanish: Permite a los Inquisidores purgar Ciudades Santas; si existe una civilización qué tiene dos ciudades con la religión de la ciudad santa purgada, la ciudad santa se reubicara
TEXT.Finnish: Allows inquisitions to purge Holy Cities; if there exists a civilization that has two cities with the religion of the purged holy city, the holy city will relocate

TEXT.English: Limited Religions Exceptions
TEXT.French: Limited Religions Exceptions
TEXT.German: Begrenzte Religionen mit Ausnahmen
TEXT.Italian: Limited Religions Exceptions
TEXT.Spanish: Limited Religions Exceptions
TEXT.Finnish: Limited Religions Exceptions

TEXT.English: When selected, Limited Religions will still allow multiple religion founding for single city civs and rebels
TEXT.French: When selected, Limited Religions will still allow multiple religion founding for single city civs and rebels
TEXT.German: Auch bei Auswahl von Begrenzten Religionen können von Zivilisationen mit nur einer Stadt und Rebellen mehrere Religionen gegründet werden.
TEXT.Italian: When selected, Limited Religions will still allow multiple religion founding for single city civs and rebels
TEXT.Spanish: When selected, Limited Religions will still allow multiple religion founding for single city civs and rebels
TEXT.Finnish: When selected, Limited Religions will still allow multiple religion founding for single city civs and rebels

TEXT.English: Limited Religions
TEXT.French: Limited Religions
TEXT.German: Begrenzte Religionen
TEXT.Italian: Limited Religions
TEXT.Spanish: Religiones Limitadas
TEXT.Finnish: Limited Religions

TEXT.English: A civ can only found one religion and thus possess only one holy city (unless more are obtained through conquest); Causes a more equal spread of religions in a game creating more diplomatic religious tensions
TEXT.French: A civ can only found one religion and thus possess only one holy city (unless more are obtained through conquest); Causes a more equal spread of religions in a game creating more diplomatic religious tensions
TEXT.German: Eine Zivilisation kann nur eine Religion gründen und somit nur eine Heilige Stadt besitzen (außer durch Eroberung); Erzeugt eine gleichmäßigere Verteilung der Religionen im Spiel und bewirkt verstärkte religiös-diplomatische Spannungen
TEXT.Italian: A civ can only found one religion and thus possess only one holy city (unless more are obtained through conquest); Causes a more equal spread of religions in a game creating more diplomatic religious tensions
TEXT.Spanish: Una civilización solo puede fundar una religión y poseer una sola ciudad santa (A no ser que se obtenga por conquista); Provoca una mayor difusión de las religiones en el juego, creando mayores tensiones diplomáticas por las religiones.
TEXT.Finnish: A civ can only found one religion and thus possess only one holy city (unless more are obtained through conquest); Causes a more equal spread of religions in a game creating more diplomatic religious tensions

TEXT.English: Choose Religions
TEXT.French: Choose Religions
TEXT.German: Religion auswählen
TEXT.Italian: Choose Religions
TEXT.Spanish: Escoger Religiones
TEXT.Finnish: Choose Religions

TEXT.English: Works the same as the game option version, except that you not only choose your own founding faith, but also the AI's
TEXT.French: Works the same as the game option version, except that you not only choose your own founding faith, but also the AI's
TEXT.German: Funktioniert wie die normale Spieloption, außer dass man nicht nur den selbst erforschten Glauben, sondern auch den der KIs auswählen kann
TEXT.Italian: Works the same as the game option version, except that you not only choose your own founding faith, but also the AI's
TEXT.Spanish: Funciona igual que la opción incluida en el juego, excepto que no solo escoges la religión, sino también la de la IA.
TEXT.Finnish: Works the same as the game option version, except that you not only choose your own founding faith, but also the AI's
